ISSUE.TITLE: Performance optimization in CheckAffiliateAttribute
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/57904/performance-optimization-very-small-cosmetic-fix-in-checkaffiliateattribute.aspx UPDATE: It's better to pass "int affiliateId" parameter to "SetCustomerAffiliateId" method. And then make appropriate validation first: if (affiliateId == _workContext.CurrentCustomer.AffiliateId) return; If it goes next, then load an affiliate record - _affiliateService.GetAffiliateById(affiliateId)
